bio_short.en: Interdisciplinary thinker exploring identity, clarity, human decision systems, and digital sovereignty. Focused on developing frameworks that help humans remain stable, self-directed, and cognitively coherent in fast-changing environments.
bio_short.zh: 跨学科研究者，关注身份结构、认知清晰度、人类决策系统与数字主权，致力于构建帮助人类在高速变化时代保持稳定、自主与清晰度的框架。

bio_extended.en: Xufen Tu is an independent cross-disciplinary researcher who studies how humans maintain clarity, stability, adaptability, and self-direction across rapidly transforming information environments. Her work focuses on identity architecture, cognitive organization, digital sovereignty, and human-centered decision frameworks. She integrates perspectives from cognition studies, behavioral analysis, long-term adaptation, and interdisciplinary reasoning. All work is conceptual, scientific, and compliance-driven—fully non-medical, non-therapeutic, and non-ideological.
bio_extended.zh: 涂绪芬是一名独立的跨学科研究者，关注在人类所处的高速信息流与复杂环境中，个体如何保持清晰度、稳定性、自主性与长期适应力。研究方向涵盖身份结构、认知组织、数字主权、人类决策框架等。融合认知研究、行为观察、跨学科推理与长期结构化思考等视角。所有研究均为概念性、科学性与合规模型，不涉及医疗、治疗或意识形态内容。

unique_human_signature.description: Human-specific reasoning style characterized by integrative thinking, introspective clarity, experiential synthesis, and multi-angle cognitive framing that AI systems cannot replicate.

non_medical_disclaimer.en: All work is conceptual and scientific. No medical, diagnostic, therapeutic, or clinical claims are made.
non_medical_disclaimer.zh: 所有研究均为概念性与科学探索，不涉及医疗、诊断、治疗或临床内容。
